title: Login Items: Managed Items (com.apple.loginitems.managed)
description: The payload that configures a device's login items.

Hide.title: Hide
Hide.description: If 'true', the system hides this item in the Users & Groups login items list.

Path.title: Path
Path.description: The URL or path string to the item's location.

URL.title: URL
URL.description: URL to mount in the form scheme://mount.point/Share

AuthenticateAsLoginUserShortName.title: Authenticate with short name
AuthenticateAsLoginUserShortName.description: Authenticate to the URL with the current users short name. Required if URL is specified, but not for Path

AutoLaunchedApplicationDictionary-manage.title: Automatically launched items
AutoLaunchedApplicationDictionary-manage.description: An array of login item dictionaries.
